 1998-11211998-06-180,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by adding a Quebec statute intitled "An Act Respecting Family Benefits" [S.Q. 1997, c. 57] to the list of prescribed provincial statutes in section 3004 where the Department of National Revenue may provide information to provincial officials for the purpose of administering a social program, effective July 1, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0347 Publication Date: 1998-07-08
